backend_llm_notes: Claude Sonnet 4.5 via Cursor Agent Mode - Advanced reasoning and instruction following
original_prompt: Land a time to meet about Project Alpha with Chris, Sangya, and Kat for 1 hour in the next 2 weeks. Schedule over 1:1s and lunches if needed and work around Kat's schedule. Make the meeting in person and add a room.

gutts.name: Meeting Requirements Extraction
gutts.capability: Parse all requirements (attendees, duration, date range, override rules, modality, resources)
gutts.user_goal: System understands all meeting parameters and constraints
gutts.evidence: Extracted: 4 attendees, 1hr, 2-week window, override 1:1s/lunches, Kat priority, in-person, room needed

gutts.name: Multi-Person Availability Aggregation
gutts.capability: Check calendars for Chris, Sangya, Kat and merge availability data
gutts.user_goal: Find times when all required attendees could be available
gutts.evidence: Retrieved and merged calendar data for all 4 participants

gutts.name: Priority Constraint Application (Kat's schedule)
gutts.capability: Ensure primary consideration of Kat's availability as hard constraint
gutts.user_goal: Kat's conflicts are absolute blockers, others can be overridden
gutts.evidence: Kat's busy times marked as hard constraints in scheduling logic

gutts.name: Override-Eligible Meeting Identification
gutts.capability: Identify 1:1s and lunches on others' calendars that can be rescheduled if needed
gutts.user_goal: System knows which existing meetings are movable
gutts.evidence: Classified existing meetings as 1:1/lunch (override-eligible) or not

gutts.name: Location-Based Filtering
gutts.capability: Filter for in-person meeting capability (office presence, not remote-only days)
gutts.user_goal: Meeting scheduled when in-person attendance is possible for all
gutts.evidence: Filtered slots to days when all attendees are in office

gutts.name: Conference Room Search & Booking
gutts.capability: Find available conference room for in-person meeting and reserve it
gutts.evidence: Room search for 4-person capacity, booking confirmation obtained

gutts.name: Optimal Slot Selection
gutts.capability: Rank and select best time considering all constraints (hard, soft, preferences)
gutts.user_goal: Best possible time is chosen balancing all factors
gutts.evidence: Ranked slots by: Kat availability, override cost, location, preferences

gutts.name: Conflict Resolution & Rescheduling
gutts.capability: If needed, reschedule override-eligible conflicts (1:1s/lunches) to make room
gutts.user_goal: Conflicts automatically resolved to accommodate meeting
gutts.evidence: Identified 1:1/lunch conflicts and initiated reschedule workflows

gutts.name: Meeting Creation & Invitations
gutts.capability: Create meeting with all attendees, room resource, and Project Alpha details
gutts.user_goal: Meeting appears on all calendars with room reserved
gutts.evidence: Event created with Chris, Sangya, Kat, room resource, 'Project Alpha' subject

notes: Generated by Claude Sonnet 4.5 - Matches reference decomposition of 9 GUTTs (most complex hero prompt)
